Mythos.description: Speed checks in Arkham are made at a -1 penalty, and players receive 1 less movement point during the Movement Phase. Sneak checks in Arkham are made at a +1 bonus. Return any Fire Vampires in play to the cup. If a Fire Vampire enters play, return it to the cup and draw a different monster.
Mythos.actions: ModifyCheck("speed", -1) and ModifyMovement(1) and ModifyCheck("sneak", 1) and ReturnToCupMonstersType("fire vampire")
Mythos.name: Raining Cats and Dogs
